price: 36.Yi Rabbow addunyal yoo wadirros ku naqoosa edde ugussa ayrô fanah iyye ibliis.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
